page.title: 04Sports Centre continued
page.content: The sports centre has its own Council which organises Amesbury Carnival and the annual Fifteen Mile Road Race. In the daytime the centre is used by Stonehenge Comprehensive School and in the evenings and at weekends it is open to the public.Last year it catered for 11,576 people and there were 385 telephone enquiries in February alone. There is a coffee lounge and a licensed bar overlooking the squash courts.The centre is closed for only three weeks in the summer for repairs and maintenance. All the facilities may be hired for private functions.
